manpage.name: prints information about a compact disc
manpage.title: Compact Disc Information
manpage.description: cdinfo takes a compact disc device and writes information about the current disc to standard output. This includes the total number of tracks, the total length of the disc, the FreeDB and MusicBrainz disc IDs, and the length/offset information of each track.
